title: What are some good songs that make me feel good being single? - Quora

response.answer_text: I love these questions! Most of this doubles as my “Love Yourself” Playlist You Learn by Alanis Morissette I’m Too Sexy by Right Said Fred One is the Magic # by Jill Scott Love Stinks by J. Geils Band I Don’t Want to Be In Love (Dance Floor Anthem) by Good Charlotte Titanium by David Guetta Feat. Sia Since U Been Gone by Kelly Clarkson Put Your Records On by Corrine Bailey Rae i by Kendrick Lamar I’m Like a Bird by Nelly Furtado Roar by Katy Perry Marriage is For Old Folks by Nina Simone Bulletproof by LaRoux I’m Coming Out by Diana Ross Unwritten by Natasha Beddingfield Me, Myself & I by G-Eazy and Bebe Rexha Perfect by P!nk Shake it Off by Taylor Swift No Scrubs by TLC Stronger by Kelly Clarkson Pocket Full of Sunshine by Natasha Beddingfield Don’t Stop by Fleetwood Mac Eye of the Tiger by Survivor Brave by Sara Bareilles Telephone by Beyonce and Lady Gaga Express Yourself by Madonna It’s My Life by Bon Jovi Unpretty by TLC Video by India.Arie None of Your Business by Salt-n-Pepa The Climb by Miley Cyrus I’m Ridin’ Solo by Jason Derülo Firework by Katy Perry Keep Ya Head Up by Tupac Whistle (While You Work It) by Katy Tiz Single Ladies by Beyonce The Wanderer by Dion Girls Just Wanna Have Fun by Cyndi Lauper

Not sure if they’d make you feel good specifically about being single, but I’d recommend listening to some Nightwish. Finnish metal band, with the vast majority of their songs discussing life, rather than love. I like them because a lot of their music is philosophical, and the very fact that it’s symphonic metal should be enough to increase your heart rate a bit. I’m afraid that my taste in music a heck of a long way from normal, but that would be what I’d suggest if you don’t want to listen to music about being in love (as unfortunately, the vast majority of music is). Thanks for the request to answer, and I hope that my suggestion - despite being outwith the normal range of answers you’re likely to receive - is useful.
